content: MLAI@YonseiSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationMachine Learning andArtificial Intelligence LabMLAI Lab is looking for students and researchers (e.g., postdocs) who are highly interested in ML and AI.If you are interested in MLAI Lab, please contact kyungwoo.song (at) gmail.com[학생 및 연구원을 위한 MLAI 연구실 소개]MLAI Lab focuses on understanding the context of the given/real-world data to improve the generalization.Trustworthy AIAgentic AIGenerative ModelsBayesian Neural NetworksCausal Representation LearningMechanistic InterpretabilityMedical AISupporters and CollaboratorsReport abusePage detailsPage updated Report abuse
